## Shape.LeftInch property

表示形状与其左列的水平偏移量，单位为英寸。

```csharp
public double LeftInch { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.LeftInch == 3)
    shape.LeftInch = 1;
```
